name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Republican members of the U.S. House of Representatives are drafting a bill that may revoke China's permanent normal trade relations status.
The Chinese Foreign Ministry responded: The United States granted China permanent normal trade relations status in 2001. Some U.S. politicians are trying to reverse history and violate WTO rules. We urge relevant U.S. lawmakers to abide by WTO rules and stop their words and deeds that harm others and do not benefit themselves.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 9, Dazhu County, Sichuan. It was revealed online that Dazhu Middle School has strict management of students, with students having only 40 minutes for lunch and not being allowed to leave school in the afternoon. A series of regulations caused dissatisfaction among students and collective protests. Students wrote on paper, "Fight, students of Dazhu Middle School, against autocratic rule"
Some students waved the party flag in the corridor to vent their dissatisfaction.
